page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Farming is still an important employer in Stanhoe, but the majority of those in work travel to Fakenham or King's Lynn to the factories, garages or shops. There is no transport that fits in with work times so cars are shared and some youngsters use scooters or motorbikes. The largest category of all is the self-employed and this includes a builder, plumber, heating engineer, carpenter, painter and decorator, jig-saw puzzle maker, coach and carriage builder, shop owner, writer, corn merchant, car mechanic and electrician. Over half the population are however, retired, and a small number coming from former life in a town to enjoy their retirement in the country.
